long_description: The straight keel line and sharp bow entry make the Old Town Penobscot 16 Canoe easy to paddle. While excellent in flat water, the design and Oltonar/Royalex(R) construction makes it very much at home in fast water. Oltonar/Royalex is lightweight while offering excellent strength and toughness. Oltonar/Royalex construction gives canoe high impact- and abrasion-resistance, plus excellent structural memory and resilience. Fine tandem day-tripping boat or solo canoe for paddlers with higher skill levels. Straight-on speed, handling ease and capacity make this an all-around performance canoe. Rounded bottom provides turning responsiveness. Features new vintage-look gold-leaf graphics based on custom designs from the 1920s. Standard features include black anodized aluminum gunwales, polyethylene decks with grab handles, ash carrying yoke and thwart, and web seats.
short_description: The straight keel line and sharp bow entry make the Old Town Penobscot 16 Canoe easy to paddle.
